news.title: UnitedHealth's rough stretch continues, with buyouts, a reported DOJ probe and a 23% drop in three months
news.summary: The news extends a tumultuous period for UnitedHealth. It follows the killing of a top executive, a costly cyberattack against its subsidiary and high medical costs.

news.title: Home sales drop sharply as prices hit an all-time high for January
news.summary: The median price of a home sold in January was $396,900, up 4.8% from the year before. It was the highest price ever for the month of January.

news.title: Shares of Hims & Hers tumble 23% after FDA says semaglutide is no longer in shortage
news.summary: FDA says semaglutide is no longer in shortage. Shares of Hims & Hers tumble 21% after FDA says it's no longer needed.

news.title: Shortage of Novo Nordisk's Wegovy and Ozempic drugs is resolved, FDA says
news.summary: The FDA's decision will threaten the ability of compounding pharmacies to make far cheaper, unbranded versions of the injections over the next few months.

news.title: Block shares plunge 17%, head for worst day in 5 years after earnings miss
news.summary: Block was on pace for its worst day on the stock market since 2020 after the company reported an earnings miss. Block was on track for a day of losses that would have been its worst since 2020.

news.title: Board games and firepits: Senior communities are pulling out all the stops to lure Generation X. Here’s why.
news.summary: Gen X will outnumber baby boomers in 2028, according to a new study. Retirement communities are courting members of Gen X.

news.title: Treasury yields slip as data raise questions about strength of U.S. economy
news.summary: U.S. Treasury yields slipped on Friday after a fresh batch of data raised questions about the strength of the U.S.'s economy.

news.title: Young traders don’t care if stocks and crypto are in a bubble. They could get a rude awakening.
news.summary: A new survey found that the majority of active traders are bullish. Despite some thinking the market is in a bubble, the majority are bullish, the survey found.

news.title: This energy-drink stock is rallying thanks to a $1.8 billion acquisition
news.summary: Celsius shares are up more than 30% after its quarterly results topped estimates and it announced plans to buy Alani Nu. Celsius shares areUp 30% in pre-market trading.

news.title: ‘I believe myself to be an honorable person’: Do I have the right to ask my husband if I’ll inherit his house after he dies?
news.summary: “He and his first wife have a son who just graduated from university,” his daughter says. “He’s always been very proud of his son.”
